jobDescription: Are you looking for innovation? Your search is over - it happens here.Data Analytics in Enterprise Analytics(DA) has the overall responsibility to serve as the strategic interface with assigned business units or functional area for the purpose of data analysis, analytics, solution discovery and service management, related to business intelligence and analytics initiative. DA serves as the partner between business units and IT teams including Enterprise Architecture, Data warehousing, and Business Intelligence. The DA provides highly valued strategic consulting level support and guidance through key IT initiatives. They proactively share knowledge of data, technology risks and opportunities to build competitive advantage and improve efficiency and effectiveness of business units using data driven approach.The Data Analyst will operate as the key business contact representing IT in promoting IT services and capabilities. The DA provides support in delivering analytics products that meet the needs of the business. The DA focuses on strategic initiatives and planning activities for their business area. They serve a lead role in enabling the business to achieve their objectives through the effective use of analytics.  #LI-DNILocationBoston, QuincyTime TypeFull time
